name: swimming_diving_board_seed123
description: The robot should walk up two rectangular blocks (one 0.3m high, one 0.6m high), which are 2m wide and positioned next to each other. It should then walk onto a heavy, balanced 'diving board' platform located on the top block. The robot must walk along this diving board to its end, where a small cone is balanced. The robot should then kick this small cone into the 'swimming pool'. After kicking the cone, the robot must perform a diving motion from the diving board into the 'swimming pool' (represented by a 0.01m high, 4mx4m square plane). Finally, the robot should act like it is swimming in the pool. The end state requires the small cone to be in the swimming pool and the robot to be performing a swimming motion within the pool.

children.name: walk_to_lowBlock
children.description: The robot should walk towards and position itself in front of the lower rectangular block (Object1) to prepare for climbing it.

children.name: walk_up_lowBlock
children.description: The robot should walk up and fully ascend the lower rectangular block (Object1), ensuring both feet are on top of the block.

children.name: walk_up_highBlock
children.description: From the top of the lower block, the robot should walk up and fully ascend the higher rectangular block (Object2), ensuring both feet are on top of the block.

children.name: walk_onto_divingBoard
children.description: From the top of the high block, the robot should walk onto the heavy, balanced 'diving board' platform (Object3), ensuring both feet are fully on the board.

children.name: walk_along_divingBoard_to_smallCone
children.description: The robot should walk along the 'diving board' platform (Object3) until it reaches the end where the small cone (Object5) is balanced, positioning itself appropriately to kick the cone.

children.name: kick_smallCone_into_swimmingPool
children.description: The robot should use one of its legs to kick the small cone (Object5) from the end of the diving board into the 'swimming pool' (Object4).

children.name: dive_from_divingBoard_into_swimmingPool
children.description: After kicking the cone, the robot should perform a controlled diving motion from the end of the 'diving board' (Object3) into the 'swimming pool' (Object4), aiming for a head-first entry.

children.name: perform_swimming_motion_in_swimmingPool
children.description: Once in the 'swimming pool' (Object4), the robot should perform a continuous swimming motion, simulating movement through water.
